pkgmetadata.longdescription: Common Multiple Testing Procedures and Gatekeeping Procedures // Implementation of commonly used p-value-based and parametric multiple testing procedures (computation of adjusted p-values and simultaneous confidence intervals) and parallel gatekeeping procedures based on the methodology presented in the book "Multiple Testing Problems in Pharmaceutical Statistics" (edited by Alex Dmitrienko, Ajit C. Tamhane and Frank Bretz) published by Chapman and Hall/CRC Press 2009.
